name: RNG ARENA
description:
RNG ARENA was a hastily made game for procjam 2015

RNG ARENA is a top-down shooter where waves of enemies will swarm you and attempt to kill you.

Good thing you have your trusty RNG gun! It changes properties every 5 seconds, so one moment you may have an auto sniper, the next a HE shotgun.

Faster enemies to less damage, slower enemies do more. Good luck trying to avoid them!

Every wave you beat gives you some health! It'll help a lot in the long run.

Good luck!
